reviewtext: A perfect good Ethernet switch but I didn't see the it is only 10/100 Mbps. So it is the bottleneck in my network. I now use it as an extra switch if I need additional temporary connections. It states "Every port supports up to 200 Mbps in dedicated bandwidth" but I could verify this.Pros:- Very reliable- Small footprintCons:- Only for 10/100 Mbps networks- No indicator light on front (non cable side since this is not rack mounted)- Rubber feet tend to fall off
summary: Read the fine print (maybe not so fine)
